plot: Fabricio claims to be a worm trapped inside a human body. After failing in his try to live according to his self proclaimed nature, decides to go for a last chance to proof himself right by dying as a worm.
title: El gusano
plot_es: Fabricio claims to be a worm trapped inside a human body. After failing in his try to live according to his self proclaimed nature, decides to go for a last chance to proof himself right by dying as a worm.
plot_en: Fabricio claims to be a worm trapped inside a human body. After failing in his try to live according to his self proclaimed nature, decides to go for a last chance to proof himself right by dying as a worm.
